674 -                     onKeyDown={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && addCommand()}
675 -                   />
668                   </div>
669 -                <button type="button" className="btn btn--sm" onClick={addCommand}>Add</button>
669 +                <button type="button" className="btn btn--sm" onClick={addQuickLaunch}>Add</button>
670                 </div>
671 +               <p className="form-group__hint" style={{ marginTop: 'var(--spacing-sm)' }}>
672 +                 Quick launch presets appear in the workspace dropdown for one-click spawning.
673 +               </p>
674               </div>
675             )}
676
...
855                   onClick={prevStep}
856                   disabled={saving}
857                 >
858 -                ← Back
858 +                Back
859                 </button>
860               )}
861               {!isFirstRun && currentStep === 1 && (
...
879                 disabled={saving}
880               >
881                 {saving ? 'Saving...' : isFirstRun ?
882 -                (currentStep === TOTAL_STEPS ? 'Finish Setup' : 'Next →') :
882 +                (currentStep === TOTAL_STEPS ? 'Finish Setup' : 'Next') :
883                   'Save Changes'
884                 }
885               </button>
